lead_paragraph: Mark Martin will leave Roush Racing at the end of this season to drive a partial Nextel Cup schedule for MB2 Motorsports in 2007. Roush has fielded a Ford for Martin in Nascar’s top series every year since 1988.
snippet: Mark Martin will leave Roush Racing at the end of this season to drive a partial Nextel Cup schedule for MB2 Motorsports in 2007. Roush has fielded a Ford for Martin in Nascar’s top series every year since 1988.
